actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
  mp.id_matiere_premiere,
  mp.nom,
  mp.description,
  mp.categorie,
  u.nom_unite AS unite,
  mp.prix_achat_ht,
  mp.stock_minimal,
  f.nom_fournisseur
FROM 
  newroseclaire.matieres_premieres AS mp
LEFT JOIN 
  newroseclaire.unites AS u ON mp.id_unite = u.id_unite
LEFT JOIN 
  newroseclaire.fournisseurs AS f ON mp.id_fournisseur = f.id_fournisseur
WHERE 
  mp.actif = true
ORDER BY 
  mp.nom;
